question_bank.diffident: She was too _____ to raise her hand because she doubted her answer was correct.
question_bank.prophetic: His _____ prediction in 2019 that the company would collapse proved accurate two years later.
question_bank.conformity: Peer pressure pushed students toward _____, even when they privately disagreed.
question_bank.distribution: The histogram shows the age _____ of participants, with most clustered in their 20s.
question_bank.authoritative: For citation, use an _____ source such as an official guideline or a peer-reviewed textbook.
question_bank.collaborating: The two laboratories are _____ on a joint manuscript and will share first authorship.
question_bank.debilitate: A prolonged high fever can _____ patients and slow their recovery.
question_bank.contentious: The city council meeting became _____, with members arguing over nearly every motion.
question_bank.reticent: Under legal advice, she remained _____ about the incident and declined to discuss details.
question_bank.truism: Calling the plan “a learning experience” was a _____ that added no useful information.
question_bank.prudence: Basic financial _____ suggests building an emergency fund before investing in risky assets.
question_bank.munificent: The university received a _____ donation of ₩1 billion to endow a new scholarship fund.
question_bank.mitigate: Installing backup servers can _____ the risk of data loss during an outage.
question_bank.callow: The _____ intern spoke confidently but lacked any real experience with the procedure.
question_bank.duplicitous: The witness was _____, giving one version of events in public and another in private.
question_bank.conducive: A quiet, well-lit workspace is _____ to focused studying.
question_bank.astute: An _____ negotiator noticed a hidden penalty clause before signing the contract.
question_bank.versatile: A _____ pocketknife can be used to cut rope, open packages, and tighten small screws.
question_bank.derivative: Critics called the sequel _____ because it reused the original plot without new ideas.
question_bank.meticulous: Her _____ bookkeeping included matching every receipt to a specific invoice number.
question_bank.eulogy: He delivered a heartfelt _____ at the memorial service.
question_bank.deride: Instead of addressing the evidence, the trolls chose to _____ the author’s accent online.
question_bank.incongruous: The party hats felt _____ at a ceremony intended to be solemn and reflective.
question_bank.exonerate: The newly discovered DNA evidence helped _____ the defendant of the charges.
question_bank.wary: After being scammed once, she was _____ of signing any contract without reading the fine print.
